text.en: Mother of the Buddhas of the three times and their heirs,
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwa sé ché kyepé yum

text.en: The victorious one, foremost and exalted Tārā,
Indivisible from my guru, embodiment of all the Buddhas—
With single-pointedness of body, speech and mind, I respectfully supplicate you:
text.en-trans: go sum tsechik güpé solwa deb

text.en: With your deathless and blissful vajra wisdom,
Ripen and liberate me such that twofold benefit is swiftly won!
text.en-trans: min ching drol né dön nyi nyur drub shok
